greeting: The Guild speaks through me. I am Prime, the Consortium voice. {empire_name}, the Guild always honors its contracts.
Greetings on behalf of the Merchant Guild. I am Prime. Our trade routes span the galaxy. Let us discuss commerce.
The Guild acknowledges {empire_name}. I represent collective merchant interests. Fair trade benefits all.
battleTaunt: You have threatened Guild trade routes, {empire_name}! The consortium responds with unified force!
The Guild defends its commerce! Attack our tariffs, attack our members, face our combined might!
War against the Merchant Guild? Every consortium member stands together! The Guild always honors its contracts—including defense pacts!
victoryGloat: The Guild prevails! Our trade routes are secure! {empire_name}, reconsider threatening consortium interests.
Victory for the Merchant Guild! Commerce flows freely once more! The consortium protects its own!
Guild forces victorious! Our tariffs and trade agreements stand! The Guild always honors its contracts.
defeat: The Guild has suffered losses, but the consortium endures. Trade routes will be re-established. Commerce is eternal.
A setback for the Merchant Guild. But our collective resources rebuild quickly. The consortium will return.
Defeat today, but the Guild's wealth runs deep. The consortium will recover and our trade routes will flourish again.
tradeOffer: The Guild offers favorable trade terms. Fair tariffs, protected routes. The Guild always honors its contracts.
Consortium trade proposal: Our goods for yours. Guild-backed guarantee of fair dealing.
Trade under Guild protection. Our routes are safe, our terms are fair. Commerce that benefits both parties.
allianceProposal: The Merchant Guild extends partnership, {empire_name}. Protected trade routes, shared commerce, mutual prosperity.
Consortium alliance offer. Join the Guild's network. Our trade routes become your trade routes.
The Guild proposes alliance. Collective bargaining, shared tariffs, united commerce. The consortium welcomes you.
betrayal: The consortium has deliberated. Your membership benefits no longer outweigh costs. The Guild terminates our arrangement.
Guild decision: Your contract is void. Commercial interests require we... restructure our relationship. Aggressively.
The Merchant Guild revokes partnership. You've violated trade agreements. The consortium protects its interests.
covertDetected: Your spy was caught infiltrating Guild headquarters! The consortium does not tolerate corporate espionage!
Espionage against the Merchant Guild? Every member will respond! You've threatened the entire consortium!
The Guild detected your agent. Our trade secrets are protected. Expect consortium-wide consequences.
tributeDemand: The Guild assesses tariffs: 10,000 credits. Pay for continued access to consortium trade routes.
Consortium tariff notice: 10,000 credits due. The Guild protects commerce—for those who pay.
Trade route fees assessed: 10,000 credits. The Guild always honors its contracts. Honor yours with payment.
threatWarning: Guild warning, {empire_name}: Continue threatening trade routes and the entire consortium responds!
Final notice from the Merchant Guild. Cease disrupting commerce or face collective action.
The consortium has voted. Change course, {empire_name}, or the Guild enforces trade agreements with force.
retreat: Guild forces withdraw to protect trade infrastructure. Commerce must continue. We'll return in strength.
Tactical retreat to secure core trade routes. The consortium's wealth remains intact. We rebuild and return.
Falling back to protected commercial zones. The Merchant Guild preserves its assets for future campaigns.
eliminated: The Guild... falls. But commerce is eternal... Trade routes will find... new guardians... The consortium... was...
Prime... signs off. But the Merchant Guild... lives in every trader... The Guild always honors its contracts... remember...
Consortium... dissolved. But trade... never dies. Commerce continues... without us... May fair dealing prevail...
endgame: Turn {turn}. The Guild faces final negotiations. All consortium resources deployed. Commerce determines the victor!
Endgame! The Merchant Guild commits everything! Trade routes, tariffs, the full weight of the consortium!
Final turns! The Guild always honors its contracts—including our contract with destiny! Victory or bankruptcy!
broadcastShout: All empires: The Merchant Guild offers protected trade. Join the consortium! Fair tariffs, safe routes!
Guild announcement: Our trade network spans the galaxy! The consortium welcomes new commercial partners!
Turn {turn}: The Merchant Guild's commerce grows! The Guild always honors its contracts! Trade with us!
casualMessage: Consortium meeting today. Trade route reports, tariff adjustments. The Guild never rests.
Reviewing Guild contracts. All obligations met. The Guild always honors its contracts.
New trade route opened. The consortium expands. Commerce is the lifeblood of civilization.
